  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/AverageTest.cir.sh COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} AverageTest.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} AverageTest.cir ${OutputDataDir}/MEASURE/AverageTest.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/AverageTest.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/AverageTest.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/AverageTest.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;measure")
endif()

  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/DerivativeTest.cir.sh COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} DerivativeTest.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} DerivativeTest.cir ${OutputDataDir}/MEASURE/DerivativeTest.cir.prn )

  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/DerivativeTest.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;measure")

  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/LeadCurrentNotOnPrintLineTest.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;measure")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/LeadCurrentNotOnPrintLineTest.cir.sh COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} LeadCurrentNotOnPrintLineTest.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} LeadCurrentNotOnPrintLineTest.cir ${OutputDataDir}/MEASURE/LeadCurrentNotOnPrintLineTest.cir.prn )

  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/RMSTest.cir.sh COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} RMSTest.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} RMSTest.cir ${OutputDataDir}/MEASURE/RMSTest.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/RMSTest.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/RMSTest.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/RMSTest.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;measure")
endif()

  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/bad_error_measure_line1.cir.sh COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bad_error_measure_line1.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bad_error_measure_line1.cir ${OutputDataDir}/MEASURE/bad_error_measure_line1.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/bad_error_measure_line1.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bad_error_measure_line1.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/bad_error_measure_line1.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;measure;errorexit;bug785")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/dotOpNoTran.cir.sh COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} dotOpNoTran.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} dotOpNoTran.cir ${OutputDataDir}/MEASURE/dotOpNoTran.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/dotOpNoTran.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dotOpNoTran.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MEASURE/dotOpNoTran.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;parallel;measure;errorexit")
endif()
